attributes.action: Urgent review of "two-tier" system of non justice  undermining British society.
attributes.additional_details: In 2025 the Criminal Justice System of the United Kingdom (Police; CPS; Judiciary) can no longer be regarded as neutral,  impartial  or fit for purpose.
attributes.background: Sanction an independent review of this emergent issue re "two-tier" non justice, across UK state. This fatally undermines the trust between the state (its elected & appointed officials) & British subjects/citizens.

rejection.details: You could submit a petition setting out more clearly what you would want such a review to focus on.
